description: Chong Acupuncture and Integrative Medicine Clinic in Encinitas, CA is focused on women's health issues. We treat women for PMS, menopause, hormone imbalances, pregnancy, pre-natal care, post-natal care, pain, anxiety and depression with acupuncture, herbal medicine, massage, body work, sound therapy, reiki energy and chakra alignment.
